comment: easy-ish A in chem 2 lab for nursing majors. helps you through the procedures and helps you understand experimental errors

He started teaching my class in the middle of the semester. During the lectures I never understood the overall concept he was trying to teach and it was hard to follow along. After taking the first test he wrote I felt 10 times more confident. His tests are straightforward and don't try to trick you. All you have to do is try to pay attention!
